name: Trust in Digital Life
membership:
TDL is itself a not-for-profit membership association. We collaborate with Digital Enlightenment Forum and Open Identity Exchange (OIX) -  see https://trustindigitallife.eu/partners/. 
TDL is a member of the European Cybersecurity Organisation (ECSO) - https://www.ecs-org.eu/.
goal: TDLâ€™s mission is to create a trusted ecosystem that protects data and assets of citizens and enterprises through which industry can provide innovative and trustworthy ICT products and solutions across Europe. Our vision is a vibrant digital Europe that benefits both business and citizens and that all have reason to trust.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: The regulations and initiatives that we actively follow and act upon are eIDAS, GDPR, PSD2, Cybersecurity PPP, Distributed Ledger Technologies, Artificial Intelligence, 5G and the Internet of Things.
